subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Haynesfield moved closer to a Triple Crown race, easily winning the $107,600 Whirlaway Stakes for 3-year-olds at Aqueduct. The victory was the fourth in a row for Haynesfield, a New York-bred colt trained by Steve Asmussen. Haynesfield ran 1 minute 44.48 seconds for the mile-and-a-sixteenth race. ¶Pioneerof the Nile rallied to win the $200,000 Robert B. Lewis Stakes and give trainer Bob Baffert a Kentucky Derby candidate. The colt won his 3-year-old debut by a half-length over Papa Clem at Santa Anita. pioneerof (AP).
